column4: Hi, I get a message on startup that $HOME/.dmrc is being ignored. How do I fix it?
Just go to your home folder, find that file and delete it. It *should* work.
should. =) Because I can't see your system, can't say for sure that it will work. By saying should, it gives me some protection that you won't blame me if it doesn't work. =)
Go to your home folder, press Ctrl + H
